author: Warner Todd Huston, Warner Todd Huston
title: NBA Star Steph Curry to Interview Dr. Anthony Fauci on Thursday
description: Golden State Warriors star Stephen Curry will interview Dr. Anthony Fauci about the coronavirus on Instagram, this Thursday.
content:
Golden State Warriors star Stephen Curry will interview Dr. Anthony Fauci about the coronavirus on Instagram, this Thursday.
Curry announced his “COVID-19 Q&A with Dr. Fauci” in a post on Twitter, where he promised to “talk all this COVID-19.”
Hyped to … [+1917 chars]
